data.title: Festival do Rio
data.meta_description: Festival do Rio - Rio de Janeiro Int’l Film Festival. De 5 a 15 de outubro de 2023. O Rio de Janeiro será a vitrine do cinema nacional e internacional.
data.text:
Rudder of Destiny

Two women, long-time friends, embark on a love story. They both write. They are writers who do not write to publish but for themselves. They write as a way of life. Their mutual conversation, their de...

Toll

Suellen, a toll booth attendant, realizes she can use her job to raise some extra money illegally. But this is only for a so-called noble cause: to send her son to an expensive gay conversion workshop...

Mask Theater

Sara, a woman who is fond of theatre, begins to experience episodes of mental confusion. In this difficult phase of life, she resorts to the memories of the plays she saw....

Aretha at the Everest

Everest, the highest mountain in the world attracts hundreds of climbers, mostly white men with the finances to pay for the undertaking, around R$ 400.000,00. Aretha Duarte, from a poor neighborhood ...

Ana

Ana's mother has died, she works as a dog-walker in the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro and lives in the outskirts of the city. Her brother is discovering the universe of drag queens, creating tension in...

Thuë Pihi Kuuwi – A Woman Thinking

A Yanomami woman observes a shaman as he prepares Yãkoana. The Yãkoana, which feeds the xapiri and allows the shamans to enter the spirits' world, also offers an encounter of perspectives and imagin...

Invisible Bodies

The documentary raises the question of the social obliteration of black women's bodies from the personal and artistic experience of 11 black women, who debate identity, collective memory, ancestry, af...

Samuel Wainer

Samuel Wainer, a talented, intuitive, self-made man, transformed and modernised the production of newspapers, both physically and in the editorial content. He created columns and small-ads pages whic...
